casebody.data:
GREENE
v.
TRUSTEE SERVICES OF CAROLINA, LLC, et al.
and
In re Kenley. No. 26P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 22, 2016. Erin Rozzelle, Charlotte, for Greene, Shaka. D. Anderson Carmen, for U.S. Bank, N.A., et al.

Adam T. Duke.

Gregory D. Spink, for Trustee Services of Carolina, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of January 2016 by Plaintiff-Appellant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of January 2016."
